item.title: Report E-2023100920
item.description:
Report E-2023100920

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-06T09:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-02
  • City: HARRISON
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: CONSIGNEE EMPLOYEE OPENED CTMV DOME COVER TO PREPARE UNLOADING. DRIVER INSTRUCTED BY UNLOADER TO REPOSITION UNIT. CONSIGNEE EMPLOYEE FAILED TO RECLOSE AND SECURE DOME COVER. AFTER REPOSITING COMPLETED UNLOADER DISCOVER PRODUCT HAD BEEN RELEASED ONTO TOP OF TANK DURING MOVEMENT. RELEASE CLEANED UP BY PLANT PERSONNEL AND UNLOADING COMPLETED WITHOUT ADDITIONAL INCIDENT.

item.title: Report X-2023100214
item.description:
Report X-2023100214

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-01T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023100214 SequenceEvent: The package was taken out of system flow due to noted spillage, upon inspection of inner contents the caps on all of the containers were loose causing spillage. DescribePack: Loose caps. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The damaged package and contents were placed in a lined hazmat tote to mitigate spillage. 2. X-2023100355 SequenceEvent: The package was taken out of system flow due to noted spillage, upon inspection of inner contents, the caps on the containers were loose causing spillage. DescribePack: Loose caps. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The damaged package and contents were placed in a lined hazmat tote to mitigate spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023100183
item.description:
Report X-2023100183

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-01T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-21
  • City: GROVE CITY
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The drum was taken out of system flow due to noted spillage, upon inspection of the drum, the bottom lip of the steel drum was punctured during processing causing spillage. DescribePack: Punctured lip/body. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The damaged drum was placed in a lined hazmat tote to mitigate spillage.

item.title: Report X-2023081463
item.description:
Report X-2023081463

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: PORTSMOUTH
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Norfolk Southern
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: NS Mechanical discovered small release of product releasing from bottom of chute around hopper gate on covered hopper BRAX8560. Personnel were able to secure the slow release and contractor was notified for remediation and proper disposal.
